commander.name: Teysa Karlov
commander.oracle_text:
If a creature dying causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.
Creature tokens you control have vigilance and lifelink.
commander.flavor_text: While Kaya is guildmaster, Teysa waits patiently at the center of the Orzhov web of power.

deck.name: +2 Mace
deck.oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+2.
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
deck.flavor_text: The weight of this magic weapon falls heavy on the wicked.

deck.name: A-Acererak the Archlich
deck.oracle_text:
When Acererak the Archlich enters, if you haven't completed Tomb of Annihilation, return Acererak the Archlich to its owner's hand and venture into the dungeon.
Whenever Acererak the Archlich attacks, create a number of 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens equal to the number of opponents you have.

deck.name: A-Ancestral Katana
deck.oracle_text:
Whenever a Samurai or Warrior you control attacks alone, you may pay {1}. When you do, attach Ancestral Katana to it.
Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has "This creature has first strike as long as it's attacking."
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

deck.name: A-Baleful Beholder
deck.oracle_text:
When Baleful Beholder enters, choose one —
• Antimagic Cone — Each opponent sacrifices an enchantment.
• Fear Ray — Creatures you control gain menace until end of turn. (A creature with menace can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

deck.name: Abandoned Outpost
deck.oracle_text:
Abandoned Outpost enters tapped.
{T}: Add {W}.
{T}, Sacrifice Abandoned Outpost: Add one mana of any color.

deck.name: Abandoned Sarcophagus
deck.oracle_text:
You may cast spells that have a cycling ability from your graveyard.
If a card that has a cycling ability would be put into your graveyard from anywhere and it wasn't cycled, exile it instead.
deck.flavor_text: Although long since dead, the banished dissenters finally took their vengeance.

deck.name: Abandon Hope
deck.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard X cards.
Look at target opponent's hand and choose X cards from it. That player discards those cards.
deck.flavor_text: As Gerrard's form vanished into the maw of trees, Hanna mouthed a silent plea, mourning a crushed dream.

deck.name: A-Base Camp
deck.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, or Wizard spell or to activate an ability of a Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, or Wizard.

deck.name: Abattoir Ghoul
deck.oracle_text:
First strike
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Abattoir Ghoul this turn dies, you gain life equal to that creature's toughness.
deck.flavor_text: Death took his humanity but not his skill with the knife.

deck.name: Abbey Gargoyles
deck.oracle_text: Flying, protection from red
deck.flavor_text:
"Though Serra has not been seen for twenty years, her gargoyles still watch over our city and punish the guilty."
—Gulsen, abbey matron

deck.name: Abbey Griffin
deck.oracle_text: Flying, vigilance
deck.flavor_text:
"The darkness crawls with vampires and ghouls, but we are not without allies."
—Mikaeus, the Lunarch

deck.name: Abbey Matron
deck.oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Abbey Matron gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
deck.flavor_text:
"The Matrons are kindly souls, but don't ask one for an ale."
—Halina, Dwarven Trader

deck.name: Abdel Adrian, Gorion's Ward
deck.oracle_text:
When Abdel Adrian, Gorion's Ward enters, exile any number of other nonland permanents you control until Abdel Adrian leaves the battlefield. Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token for each permanent exiled this way.
Choose a Background (You can have a Background as a second commander.)
deck.set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

deck.name: Abeyance
deck.oracle_text:
Until end of turn, target player can't cast instant or sorcery spells, and that player can't activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.
Draw a card.
deck.flavor_text:
"I'm too modest a wizard to reveal the full extent of my abilities."
—Ertai, wizard adept

deck.name: Abhorrent Overlord
deck.oracle_text:
Flying
When Abhorrent Overlord enters, create a number of 1/1 black Harpy creature tokens with flying equal to your devotion to black. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature.

deck.name: Abiding Grace
deck.oracle_text:
At the beginning of your end step, choose one —
• You gain 1 life.
• Return target creature card with mana value 1 from your graveyard to the battlefield.
deck.flavor_text:
"Into the smothering dark, Serra spoke a single word: 'Hope.'"
—*Song of All*, canto 2

card_faces.name: A-Blessed Hippogriff
card_faces.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Blessed Hippogriff attacks, target attacking creature without flying gains flying until end of turn.

card_faces.name: A-Tyr's Blessing
card_faces.oracle_text: Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

deck.name: A-Blood Artist
deck.oracle_text: Whenever Blood Artist or another creature dies, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

deck.name: Abnormal Endurance
deck.oracle_text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control."
deck.flavor_text: Tenacity prevails when hopes die.

deck.name: Abolish
deck.oracle_text:
You may discard a Plains card rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
deck.flavor_text: As war raged on, the young mages became more direct in their tactics, often at great cost.

deck.name: Abomination
deck.oracle_text: Whenever Abomination blocks or becomes blocked by a green or white creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

deck.name: Absolute Grace
deck.oracle_text: All creatures have protection from black.
deck.flavor_text: In pursuit of Urza, the Phyrexians sent countless foul legions into Serra's realm. Though beaten back, they left it tainted with uncleansable evil.

deck.name: Absolute Law
deck.oracle_text: All creatures have protection from red.
deck.flavor_text: The strength of law is unwavering. It is an iron bar in a world of water.

deck.name: Absolver Thrull
deck.oracle_text:
Haunt (When this creature dies, exile it haunting target creature.)
When Absolver Thrull enters or the creature it haunts dies, destroy target enchantment.

deck.name: Absolving Lammasu
deck.oracle_text:
Flying
When Absolving Lammasu enters, all suspected creatures are no longer suspected.
When Absolving Lammasu dies, you gain 3 life and suspect up to one target creature an opponent controls. (A suspected creature has menace and can't block.)

deck.name: Absorb Vis
deck.oracle_text:
Target player loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.
Basic landcycling {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

deck.name: Abstergo Entertainment
deck.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.
{3}, {T}, Exile Abstergo Entertainment: Return up to one target historic card from your graveyard to your hand, then exile all graveyards. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)
deck.flavor_text: "We make history yours!"

deck.name: Abstruse Appropriation
deck.oracle_text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Exile target nonland permanent. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend colorless mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell.
deck.flavor_text:
"Kozilek experiences reality on his own terms."
—Ayli, high priest of the Eternal Pilgrims

deck.name: Abstruse Archaic
deck.oracle_text:
Vigilance
{1}, {T}: Copy target activated or triggered ability you control from a colorless source. You may choose new targets for the copy. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)
deck.flavor_text: Unburdened from mortality, archaics wander the Vastlands seeking knowledge only they can comprehend.

deck.name: Abuelo's Awakening
deck.oracle_text: Return target artifact or non-Aura enchantment card from your graveyard to the battlefield with X additional +1/+1 counters on it. It's a 1/1 Spirit creature with flying in addition to its other types.
deck.flavor_text: Quintorius touched the old poncho he'd found. A rush of magic condensed into an Echo, and wise Abuelo stepped forth.

deck.name: Abu Ja'far
deck.oracle_text: When Abu Ja'far dies, destroy all creatures blocking or blocked by it. They can't be regenerated.

deck.name: Abuna Acolyte
deck.oracle_text:
{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
{T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target artifact creature this turn.
deck.flavor_text: "You can break nothing I cannot mend."

deck.name: Abuna's Chant
deck.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• You gain 5 life.
• Prevent the next 5 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.
Entwine {2} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

deck.name: Abundant Maw
deck.oracle_text:
Emerge {6}{B} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's mana value.)
When you cast this spell, target opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.

deck.name: A-Buy Your Silence
deck.oracle_text: Exile target nonland permanent. Its controller creates a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

deck.name: Abyssal Gatekeeper
deck.oracle_text: When Abyssal Gatekeeper dies, each player sacrifices a creature.
deck.set_name: Duel Decks Anthology: Divine vs. Demonic
deck.flavor_text:
"There are two ways for me to pass this gate. One involves you remaining conscious."
—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*

deck.name: Abyssal Gorestalker
deck.oracle_text: When Abyssal Gorestalker enters, each player sacrifices two creatures.
deck.flavor_text: Its kin once overran entire civilizations, but they tore each other to pieces in their unending hunger. Now only it remains.

deck.name: Abyssal Horror
deck.oracle_text:
Flying
When Abyssal Horror enters, target player discards two cards.
deck.flavor_text:
"I dreamt of it once. Now I fear it dreams of me."
—Tolarian scholar

deck.name: Abyssal Hunter
deck.oracle_text: {B}, {T}: Tap target creature. Abyssal Hunter deals damage equal to Abyssal Hunter's power to that creature.
deck.flavor_text: Some smiles show cheer; some merely show teeth.

deck.name: Abyssal Nightstalker
deck.oracle_text: Whenever Abyssal Nightstalker attacks and isn't blocked, defending player discards a card.

deck.name: Abyssal Nocturnus
deck.oracle_text: Whenever an opponent discards a card, Abyssal Nocturnus gets +2/+2 and gains fear until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
deck.flavor_text:
"I fear to keep an open mind, for there are those who would use it as a door to my soul."
—Voka Schlak, Mauzam Asylum inmate, diary

deck.name: Abyssal Persecutor
deck.oracle_text:
Flying, trample
You can't win the game and your opponents can't lose the game.
deck.flavor_text: His slaves crave death more than they desire freedom. He denies them both.

deck.name: Abyssal Specter
deck.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Abyssal Specter deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.
deck.flavor_text: It rides to a chorus of whispers that are more felt than heard.

deck.name: Abzan Advantage
deck.oracle_text: Target player sacrifices an enchantment. Bolster 1. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
deck.flavor_text:
"To survive, you must seize every opportunity."
—Daghatar the Adamant

deck.name: Abzan Battle Priest
deck.oracle_text:
Outlast {W} ({W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.)
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has lifelink.
deck.flavor_text: "Wherever I walk, the ancestors walk too."

deck.name: Abzan Falconer
deck.oracle_text:
Outlast {W} ({W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.)
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has flying.
deck.flavor_text: The fastest way across the dunes is above.

deck.name: Abzan Runemark
deck.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
Enchanted creature has vigilance as long as you control a black or green permanent.

deck.name: Abzan Skycaptain
deck.oracle_text:
Flying
When Abzan Skycaptain dies, bolster 2. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put two +1/+1 counters on it.)
deck.flavor_text: "A tempest is coming. Turn your faces toward the wind!"

deck.name: Academic Probation
deck.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Choose a nonland card name. Opponents can't cast spells with the chosen name until your next turn.
• Choose target nonland permanent. Until your next turn, it can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

deck.name: Academy Manufactor
deck.oracle_text: If you would create a Clue, Food, or Treasure token, instead create one of each.
deck.flavor_text: Automated systems at the Tolarian Academy sort new acquisitions for optimal use, determining which should be studied, eaten, or sold.

deck.name: Academy Rector
deck.oracle_text: When Academy Rector dies, you may exile it. If you do, search your library for an enchantment card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

deck.name: A-Cauldron Familiar
deck.oracle_text:
A-Cauldron Familiar can't block.
When Cauldron Familiar enters, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Sacrifice a Food: Return Cauldron Familiar from your graveyard to the battlefield.

deck.name: Accessories to Murder
deck.oracle_text: Whenever you crank Accessories to Murder, target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.

deck.name: Access Tunnel
deck.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{3}, {T}: Target creature with power 3 or less can't be blocked this turn.
deck.flavor_text: Oriq agents stick to the dark corners of Arcavios, unseen yet ever-present.

deck.name: Acclaimed Contender
deck.oracle_text: When Acclaimed Contender enters, if you control another Knight, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a Knight, Aura, Equipment, or legendary artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

deck.name: Accomplished Automaton
deck.oracle_text: Fabricate 1 (When this creature enters, put a +1/+1 counter on it or create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.)
deck.flavor_text: Was it just lonely, or was some form of evolution inevitable?

deck.name: Accorder Paladin
deck.oracle_text: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)
deck.flavor_text: "I fight for the suns, the surface, and everything in between."

deck.name: Accorder's Shield
deck.oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +0/+3 and has vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause it to tap.)
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
deck.flavor_text: An Auriok shield is polished to a mirror finish even on the inside, enabling its bearer to watch foes ahead and behind.

deck.name: Accursed Centaur
deck.oracle_text: When Accursed Centaur enters, sacrifice a creature.
deck.flavor_text:
"The Cabal mocks the natural order. For its minions, death is just a pause between duties."
—Kamahl, druid acolyte

deck.name: Accursed Horde
deck.oracle_text: {1}{B}: Target attacking Zombie gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. If its toughness is 0 or less, it's still put into its owner's graveyard.)

deck.name: Accursed Marauder
deck.oracle_text: When Accursed Marauder enters, each player sacrifices a nontoken creature.
deck.flavor_text: The Accursed are ever drawn to the Hekma, as though its presence provides a brief respite in their lives of eternal torment.

deck.name: Accursed Spirit
deck.oracle_text: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
deck.flavor_text: Many have heard the slither of dragging armor and the soft squelch of its voice. But only its victims ever meet its icy gaze.

deck.name: Accursed Witch // Infectious Curse
deck.type_line: Creature — Human Shaman // Enchantment — Aura Curse

card_faces.name: Accursed Witch
card_faces.oracle_text:
Spells your opponents cast that target Accursed Witch cost {1} less to cast.
When Accursed Witch dies, return it to the battlefield transformed under your control attached to target opponent.

card_faces.name: Infectious Curse
card_faces.oracle_text:
Enchant player
Spells you cast that target enchanted player cost {1} less to cast.
At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, that player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

all_parts.name: Accursed Witch // Infectious Curse
all_parts.type_line: Creature — Human Shaman // Enchantment — Aura Curse

deck.name: A-Celebrity Fencer
deck.oracle_text: Alliance — Whenever another creature enters under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Celebrity Fencer.
deck.flavor_text: After a brief but memorable incident at her first performance, she was never heckled again.

deck.name: Acererak the Archlich
deck.oracle_text:
When Acererak the Archlich enters, if you haven't completed Tomb of Annihilation, return Acererak the Archlich to its owner's hand and venture into the dungeon.
Whenever Acererak the Archlich attacks, for each opponent, you create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token unless that player sacrifices a creature.

deck.name: Ace's Baseball Bat
Acidic Dagger
deck.oracle_text: {4}, {T}: Whenever target creature deals combat damage to a non-Wall creature this turn, destroy that non-Wall creature. When the targeted creature leaves the battlefield this turn, sacrifice Acidic Dagger. Activate only before blockers are declared.

deck.name: Acid-Spewer Dragon
deck.oracle_text:
Flying, deathtouch
Megamorph {5}{B}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Acid-Spewer Dragon is turned face up, put a +1/+1 counter on each other Dragon creature you control.

deck.name: A-Circuit Mender
deck.oracle_text:
When Circuit Mender enters, you gain 3 life.
When Circuit Mender leaves the battlefield, draw a card.

deck.name: Aclazotz, Deepest Betrayal // Temple of the Dead

card_faces.name: Aclazotz, Deepest Betrayal
card_faces.oracle_text:
Flying, lifelink
Whenever Aclazotz attacks, each opponent discards a card. For each opponent who can't, you draw a card.
Whenever an opponent discards a land card, create a 1/1 black Bat creature token with flying.
When Aclazotz dies, return it to the battlefield tapped and transformed under its owner's control.

card_faces.name: Temple of the Dead
card_faces.oracle_text:
(Transforms from Aclazotz, Deepest Betrayal.)
{T}: Add {B}.
{2}{B}, {T}: Transform Temple of the Dead. Activate only if a player has one or fewer cards in hand and only as a sorcery.
card_faces.flavor_text: Chimil gave the Oltec peace in death. Aclazotz ripped it away.

all_parts.name: Aclazotz, Deepest Betrayal // Temple of the Dead

deck.name: A-Cloister Gargoyle
deck.oracle_text:
When Cloister Gargoyle enters, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
As long as you've completed a dungeon, Cloister Gargoyle gets +3/+0 and has flying.

deck.name: Acolyte of Aclazotz
deck.oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice another creature or artifact: Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
deck.flavor_text: "Great Aclazotz, receive this offering. Wrought with skill. Captured with strength. Anointed with the blood of your enemies."

deck.name: Acolyte of Xathrid
deck.oracle_text: {1}{B}, {T}: Target player loses 1 life.
deck.flavor_text: Like all priests, she gives her blessings only to those truly worthy of them.

deck.name: Acolyte's Reward
deck.oracle_text: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn, where X is your devotion to white. If damage is prevented this way, Acolyte's Reward deals that much damage to any target. (Each {W} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to white.)

deck.name: Acorn Catapult
deck.oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Acorn Catapult deals 1 damage to any target. That permanent's controller or that player creates a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token.
deck.flavor_text: The Kalonian word for "ammunition" is the same as the word for "bait."

deck.name: A-Cosmos Elixir
deck.oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, draw a card if your life total is greater than your starting life total. Otherwise, you gain 2 life and scry 1.

deck.name: Acquisitions Expert
deck.oracle_text: When Acquisitions Expert enters, target opponent reveals a number of cards from their hand equal to the number of creatures in your party. You choose one of those cards. That player discards that card. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)

deck.name: Acrobatic Cheerleader
deck.oracle_text: Survival — At the beginning of your second main phase, if Acrobatic Cheerleader is tapped, put a flying counter on it. This ability triggers only once.
deck.flavor_text: "I used to cheat death every day in practice. This is nothing."

deck.name: Acrobatic Leap
deck.oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. Untap it.
deck.flavor_text: As the cliff began to crumble, Wayta danced fearlessly across the tumbling stones, knowing Ajij would never let her fall.

deck.name: Acrobatic Maneuver
deck.oracle_text:
Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
Draw a card.
deck.flavor_text: Renegades find ever more creative ways to work around the Consulate's aether regulations.

deck.name: Activated Sleeper
deck.oracle_text:
Flash
You may have Activated Sleeper enter as a copy of any creature card in a graveyard that was put there from the battlefield this turn, except it's a Phyrexian in addition to its other types.

deck.name: Act of Authority
deck.oracle_text:
When Act of Authority enters, you may exile target artifact or enchantment.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile target artifact or enchantment. If you do, its controller gains control of Act of Authority.

deck.name: Act of Heroism
deck.oracle_text: Untap target creature. It gets +2/+2 until end of turn and can block an additional creature this turn.
deck.flavor_text:
"On every plane, there are those who run toward danger."
—Gideon Jura

deck.name: Adamant Will
deck.oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
deck.flavor_text: "I refuse to die before I see the sun rise again."

deck.name: Adanto Vanguard
deck.oracle_text:
As long as Adanto Vanguard is attacking, it gets +2/+0.
Pay 4 life: Adanto Vanguard gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

deck.name: Adaptive Automaton
deck.oracle_text:
As Adaptive Automaton enters, choose a creature type.
Adaptive Automaton is the chosen type in addition to its other types.
Other creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1.
deck.flavor_text: Such loyalty can only be made.

deck.name: Adaptive Gemguard
deck.oracle_text: Tap two untapped artifacts and/or creatures you control: Put a +1/+1 counter on Adaptive Gemguard. Activate only as a sorcery.
deck.flavor_text: Left their own devices, gnomes reengineer their own devices.

deck.name: Adaptive Shimmerer
deck.oracle_text:
Flash
Adaptive Shimmerer enters with three +1/+1 counters on it.
deck.flavor_text:
"You sure you want to see what emerges? You might not like it. It definitely won't like you."
—Kinnan, bonder prodigy

deck.name: Adarkar Sentinel
deck.oracle_text: {1}: Adarkar Sentinel gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
deck.flavor_text:
"We encountered the sentinels in the wastes, near no living thing. Their purpose was inscrutable."
—Disa the Restless, journal entry

deck.name: Adarkar Valkyrie
deck.oracle_text:
Flying, vigilance
{T}: When target creature other than Adarkar Valkyrie dies this turn, return that card to the battlefield under your control.
deck.flavor_text: She doesn't escort the dead to the afterlife, but instead raises them to fight and die again.

deck.name: A-Dawnbringer Cleric
deck.oracle_text:
When Dawnbringer Cleric enters, choose one —
• Cure Wounds — You gain 2 life.
• Dispel Magic — Destroy target enchantment.
• Gentle Repose — Exile target card from a graveyard.

deck.name: Addle
deck.oracle_text: Choose a color. Target player reveals their hand and you choose a card of that color from it. That player discards that card.
deck.flavor_text:
"I'll wring out your tiny mind like a sponge."
—Urborg witch

deck.name: A-Deal Gone Bad
deck.oracle_text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. Target player mills three cards. You gain 3 life.

deck.name: A-Death-Priest of Myrkul
deck.oracle_text:
Skeletons, Vampires, and Zombies you control get +1/+1.
At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, create a 1/1 black Skeleton creature token.
deck.flavor_text: "The Reaper bids you rise!"

deck.name: Adeline, Resplendent Cathar
deck.oracle_text:
Vigilance
Adeline, Resplendent Cathar's power is equal to the number of creatures you control.
Whenever you attack, for each opponent, create a 1/1 white Human creature token that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control.

deck.name: A-Demon's Due
deck.oracle_text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. You lose 2 life.
deck.flavor_text: Ob Nixilis extends his hand not in partnership, but to affirm your subservience.

deck.name: Adherent of Hope
deck.oracle_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control a Basri planeswalker, put a +1/+1 counter on Adherent of Hope.
deck.flavor_text: "Basri has shown me the way forward, and I will follow."

deck.name: Adipose Offspring
deck.oracle_text:
Emerge {5}{W} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's mana value.)
When Adipose Offspring enters, create a 2/2 white Alien creature token. If Adipose Offspring's emerge cost was paid, instead create X of those tokens, where X is the sacrificed creature's toughness.

deck.name: Admonition Angel
deck.oracle_text:
Flying
Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, you may exile target nonland permanent other than Admonition Angel.
When Admonition Angel leaves the battlefield, return all cards exiled with it to the battlefield under their owners' control.
